entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
